review_blob: Pours a clear, dark brown with thin to no head. Aroma is thick and a bit woody, and reminds me of something i cant put to words. It feels great on the tongue, and gives my mouth a pleasurable experience.

This is one of my favourites!
Gorgeous red-ish color, nice malty and  semi dry. Little head, only had it from can so far.
Easy to drink, nice and round. No head, but a nice refresher if your not in the mood for heavy beer.
